name: Happy birthday to me!!!
description:
HBTM!

This is stealth action game with elements of rogue like. Your task is to escape by reaching exit. During you journey you must hide in the shadows. Sometimes you can find heart which gives you one from 7 abilities. Some abilities require to use charge. You can restore charge slot by killing a soldier. At the beginning you can have only one charge at same time

List of abilities:

1)  Speed - increases your movement speed

2) Heart sensor - you can sense heart beating

3) Death from above - you can perform kill when you on celling and victim above you by pressing R

4) Acid shot - you can spill acid projectile by pressing E. Requires one charge to use

5) Stone skin - you are invulnerable for some period of time. Activated by pressing Q. Requires one charge to use

6) Charge from tanks - you can restore one charge slot by consuming one energy tank

7) Two slots - you can have two charges at same time

Controls:

w, a, s ,d - movement

space - - jump attack

f - enter/exit ventilation

q - use stone skill if available

e - use acid shot if available
